General.Name: Rossell India Limited
General.Description: Rossell India Limited offers aviation products and services primarily in India. It operates through Cultivation, Manufacture, and Sale of Tea; and Aviation Products and Services. The company provides aviation products and services, such as wire harnesses, interconnect systems and panels, electronics assemblies, after market services for electrical products, and engineering and systems integration. It also offers black pepper. In addition, the company exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, France, Germany, and other countries. The company was formerly known as Rossell Tea Limited and changed its name to Rossell India Limited in April 2011. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India. Rossell India Limited is a subsidiary of BMG Enterprises Ltd.

1.Name: Mr. Nirmal Kumar Khurana
1.Title: CFO, Director of Fin., Compliance Officer, Company Sec., Chief IR Officer & Director

3.Name: Mr. Suneel Singh Sikand
3.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Rossell Tea Division
